devdoc.details: A subscription manager for daily savings transfers with ERC-4337 and EIP-7702 support

ECDSAInvalidSignatureLength(uint256).details: The signature has an invalid length.

ECDSAInvalidSignatureS(bytes32).details: The signature has an S value that is in the upper half order.

cancelFor(address).details: Cancel subscription for another user (only callable by authorized relayers)

params.user: Address of the user to cancel subscription for

constructor.details: Constructor sets the EntryPoint and domain separator

params._entryPoint: Address of the ERC-4337 EntryPoint contract

params.tokenAddress: Token contract address for the transfer

execute(address,bytes).details: Function to execute arbitrary contract calls (for ERC-4337 compatibility)

params.tokenAddress: Token contract address for the transfers
params.users: Array of users whose subscriptions to execute

executeWithTokenData(address,address).details: Execute subscription using EIP-7702 token data

params.tokenAddress: Token contract address for the transfer

getSubscriptionWithPayload(address).details: Function to get subscription details with payload from EIP-7702 token

params.receiver: Address to receive the daily transfers

subscribeWithEIP712(address,address,uint.details: Subscribe with EIP-712 signature and token binding

params.receiver: Address to receive the daily transfers
params.tokenContract: Address of the EIP-7702 compliant contract
params.tokenId: ID of the EIP-7702 token to bind subscription data to
params.user: User address that will provide the funds

params.receiver: Address to receive the daily transfers
params.user: User address that will provide the funds

subscribeWithToken(address,uint256,uint2.details: Subscribe to daily savings with EIP-7702 token binding

params.receiver: Address to receive the daily transfers
params.tokenContract: Address of the EIP-7702 compliant contract
params.tokenId: ID of the EIP-7702 token to bind subscription data to

params.requiredPrefund: Amount of ETH required for prefunding

devdoc.title: DailySavingsManager
